turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Alexa, I should be back to the office by 2 this afternoon, can you have some hot coffee ready for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does Starbucks still have those hot white chocolate lattes that I love?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No more lattes there today, but they do have mochas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok I will go with that White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me two Venti ones, I will have the second one after that 2:30 meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want me to call down to Starbucks and get you two Venti White Chocolate Mochas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get the part about having them ready at 2pm?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, and should I just put them on the tab?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How did the sales calls go this morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is just too cold and rainy to even think about this morning!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: D0 you want a half dozen of your favorite Sous Vide Egg Bites: Egg White & Red Pepper as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I don't have time to grab anything else before that meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be on your side table when you get here

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good it will be at least 30 minutes before I get in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me review your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, I like the way you always double check tasks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is have Starbucks deliver two vente cups of White Chocolate Mocha and six pieces of Sous Vide Egg Bites: Egg White & Red Pepper by two this afternoon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Super!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Now drive safely and see you soon.
